description: The world is coming to an end.And all you've been told about it are lies.After the Great Pandemic, 1/2986th of humanity are left clawing for survival. One more death doesn’t make a difference, does it?Micka is barely sixteen when she decides to kill herself. She doesn’t fit in, doesn’t understand people or social rules. She doesn’t even understand herself. To her, all words have flavors, and emotions come with such force that she can’t help but carve them into her skin.Only hours before her meticulously planned suicide, she meets Runner - a mysterious stranger who makes an offer she finds hard to reject: a life far away from home as a Sequencer’s apprentice.There are only two rules:Survive.Kill.Based in scientific reality, the 1/2986 Climate Fiction Saga presents a terrifying glimpse into our possible future and the costs of climate change. An emotional tour de force that will appeal to fans of THE HUNGER GAMES and THE HANDMAID'S TALE
author: Annelie Wendeberg
